message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $130 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product and I am willing to pay $110 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand you see the value in this product, but $110 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $120?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I am still looking for a price closer to my budget. I am willing to pay $115 for the product.
